file_content.text: Only the greatest of all Sith are permitted to set foot in these chambers. You profane our entire history by your presence alone.
Did you believe you could breach the chambers of the Dark Council and go unpunished? That you could steal our great works without challenge?
The Sith have no "great works". Your legacy is nothing but centuries of violence and hatred.
This is a hive of evil.
This is just a room. You're just a man, misled and seduced by the dark side. There is nothing else.
I don't see it that way.
The power of the Sith is no lie. Allow me to correct your misconceptions.
Our forces have captured the entire academy. If you drop your weapon right now, you can make it out of here in one piece. If not....
Surrender!
If it's my lightsaber you want, rest assured--you'll have it.
Yeah, yeah. You're big and evil, the room is big and evil, this whole planet is big and evil. I get it, all right?
Spare me the speech.
Is that how you talk to all of your visitors? No wonder you're all alone in here.
That's no way to greet a guest!
Witticisms are a poor weapon for this fight.
If you like this place so much, then you'll love having it for a tomb.
Oh, one more Sith to kill.
Come, then!
No... the vision... how could the time come so soon?
Of course... you are not the one who kills me. You've only cleared the way for him.
Now I see... you are not the ones who kill me. You have merely cleared the path for the one who will.
I face my fate gladly, Jedi. The old man was right about me--was he right about you, too?
A member of the Dark Council could have been a valuable prisoner. Pity.
The situation was under control, Jensyn. There was no need to kill him.
Why did you kill him?
He raised his weapon. I don't take chances with Sith.
The Sith seemed to recognize you, Jensyn--something about a vision. Do you know what that was all about?
He mentioned a vision...
I'm afraid not. But the Dark Council is full of deceivers and madmen--he could have been either. Or both.
Sith are dangerous captives. Better to kill them and be done with it.
I'm glad he's dead.
Nice work, Jensyn. I thought he might never shut up.
You're my kind of Jedi.
The words of a Sith are rarely worth hearing.
Your part of the mission is done. My team will hold the academy while I search these chambers along with a few technical specialists.
Take the data and get back to Colonel Darok while the path is still clear.
He could barely move, and you strike him down? That's not our way, Jensyn.
Why did you kill him?
It's definitely the safest plan.
I will. May the Force be with you, Commander.
Understood. Good luck, Jensyn.
Gladly. The faster I get away from this rock the better.
Your mind is closed tightly, Jedi. Allow me to open it for you.
This won't take long.
You will die here!
Submit! It is the only way!
You should never have come here!
Death is your only escape!
Only the greatest Sith may walk these chambers!
Resistance will only prolong your suffering!
The power of the dark side is infinite!
Now witness true strength!
Your death is at hand!
This is what the Republic sends against the Dark Council? Pathetic!
Such unworthy opposition.
Why do you fight when you cannot win?
You lash out feebly. Like a child.
I've faced training droids with greater skill.
No... impossible!
